# NETWORK::NETWORK_SEND_TEXT_MESSAGE

## Summary
Send an unencrypted text message to another player

## Parameters
* **STRING** szTextMessage
* **GAMER_HANDLE\*** gamer

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Message is limited to 64 characters.
